forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a cool embrace, with partly cloudy skies hovering above and a gentle west-southwest wind mingling with the faintest hint of moisture. The temperature is poised to dip to around fifty degrees, inviting one to don a light jacket or a comfortable sweater, perfect for savoring the briskness that defines this coastal city. The remnants of the day's warmth linger, though with the sun setting, the evening promises a tranquil close.

Tomorrow, expect the sun to make a welcomed return, casting a cheerful glow over the cityscape with bright, mostly sunny skies. The high will gracefully hover near sixty-three, gradually receding slightly as the day matures, so layers will remain essential—comfortably breathable yet warm enough to fend off any lingering breezes. Amidst this clarity, the typical San Francisco fog may whisper around the edges, especially near the majestic Golden Gate, but none shall obscure the city’s spirited character. With such favorable weather, wanderers may find joy in a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, seeking out hidden nooks or a quiet café to enjoy the flavors of the city’s vibrant food scene.
